document_data.name: Aida al-Irrahman
document_data.mainbody: '''Aida al-Irrahman''' was a the true leader of the [[Winged Bulls]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{cite book/Assassin Mountain/Holy Slayer Sourcebook|21}}
document_data.Personality: Aida's cunning knew no bounds. She was a master of disguise and often paraded around as a man. She was also a superb orator.
document_data.Decription: Aida had pale skin and dark, curly hair. She had dark brown eyes. Her fingers and limbs were long and slender.
document_data.Activities:
The [[Marwan al-Jabal al-Hiyali|Shadow Caliph]] recognized Aida's potential to be his successor upon his eventual death. Because of this he had her operating far away from the intrigue and danger of [[Sarahin]].

Aid worked in the city of [[Qudra]], building the power of the Everlasting there and in other great cities across [[Zakhara]] through spreading propaganda.
document_data.Possessions: Aida owned a pair of ''[[bracers of defense]]'', ''[[chime of opening]]'', ''[[dagger of life stealing]]'', ''[[robe of protection|jellaba of protection]]'', and a ''[[ring of human influence]]''.{{cite book/Assassin Mountain/Cardsheets}}
